File: class/font-svg.js

var gulp = require('gulp');
var config = require('../config');
var buildHelper = require('../helpers/build-helper');
var handleErrors = require('../utils/handle-error');
var $ = require('gulp-load-plugins')({
    camelize: true
});

var format = require('string-format').extend(String.prototype);
var iconfont = require('gulp-iconfont');
var file = require('gulp-file');
var iconfontCss = require('gulp-iconfont-css');
var glyphsMap = require('iconfont-glyphs-map');
var jsonSassObj = require("json-sass-obj")

var sass = require("gulp-sass")


var base = {
    init: function () {
        return new FontSvg(this);
    }
};

/**
 * FontSvg
 * @param context
 * @constructor
 */
var FontSvg = function (context) {
    /**
     * context
     * @type {Element}
     * @private
     */
    this.context = context;
    this._init();
};

/**
 * constructor
 * @private
 */
FontSvg.prototype._init = function () {

};

/**
 * Create font width SVG
 * @public
 */

FontSvg.prototype.process = function (fontSetting) {
    return gulp.src(fontSetting.src)
        .pipe(iconfont(fontSetting.options))
        .on('glyphs', function (glyphs) {
            file(fontSetting.options.fontName.concat(".json"), JSON.stringify(glyphsMap(glyphs, true, true)))
                .pipe(gulp.dest(fontSetting.dist))

            file("_map.scss", JSON.stringify({
                name: fontSetting.options.fontName,
                path: fontSetting.options.dest,
                glyphs: glyphsMap(glyphs, true, true)
            }))
                .pipe(jsonSassObj({
                    prefix: "$font: ",
                    suffix: " !default;"
                }))
                .pipe(gulp.dest("threeds/sass/fonts/3ds_icons"))
        })
        .pipe(gulp.dest(fontSetting.dist))
};

module.exports = base;
